questions.question:
A: あの人、だれ？
B: さとうさんの（＿）です。
questions.hint: 「〜のいもうと」 = someone’s younger sister. A typical way to introduce family.

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「さとうさんのいもうと」 = Sato-san’s younger sister.
Common family reference.

  • おかね - money
  • 馬鹿（ばか） - idiot
  • いぬ - dog (possible, but not in this context)
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect 😢
The correct answer is いもうと.

  • おかね - money
  • 馬鹿（ばか） - idiot
  • いぬ - dog (possible, but not in this context)

questions.question:
A: どこでかさをかったの？
B: えきの（＿）だよ。
questions.hint: 「〜のみせ」 means “the shop at (place)” like 「駅のみせ」 = shop at the station.

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「えきのみせ」 = the station’s store.
Perfect match for buying something.

  • なか - inside
  • うえ - above
  • かいしゃ - company (not a place to buy an umbrella)
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect 😢
The correct answer is みせ.

  • なか - inside
  • うえ - above
  • かいしゃ - company (not a place to buy an umbrella)

questions.question:
A: しゅくだい、（＿）やった？
B: うん、もうおわったよ。
questions.hint: 「ちゃんと」 means “properly” or “correctly.” Used when asking if something was done well.

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「ちゃんとやった？」 = Did you do it properly?
It emphasizes that the homework was done seriously.

  • さいこう - amazing
  • ずっと - continuously
  • ときどき - sometimes
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect 😢
The correct answer is ちゃんと.

  • さいこう - amazing
  • ずっと - continuously
  • ときどき - sometimes
